API¶

poliastro2.core

Description This subpackage contains specialized core routines for orbital mechanics and astrodynamics. It provides modules for ephemerides, event detection, and a variety of actions related to orbit propagation, maneuvers, and coordinate transformations.

poliastro2.math

Description This subpackage contains general mathematical routines and utilities used throughout the Poliastro2 project, including optimization, interpolation, and linear algebra.

poliastro2.plotting

Description This subpackage provides routines for visualizing orbital trajectories and related astrodynamics data using various plotting techniques.

poliastro2.sensor

Description This package provides class and methods for sensor representation and analysis in orbital and spacecraft applications.

poliastro2.worldview

Description This package offers fixed objects, environmental parameters, and tools for representing Earth, the solar system and its celestial bodies.

poliastro2.czml

Description This subpackage provides tools to extract CZML (Cesium Language) data for the visualization of orbital trajectories and spacecraft motions.
